1010011111000101 0000101000110101 0 -> sum: 1011000111111010, cout: 0

0101110100011000 1101000111011101 1 -> sum: 0010111011110110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
